Title: Shock and Aww
Plot: Michael falls for his George Michael's ethics teacher, whom his son also has a crush on. Meanwhile, Lucille adopts a 14-year old Korean boy, and George Sr.'s "Caged Wisdom" tapes have given him a new admirer.
GuestStars: Michael Blieden, Iqbal Theba, Jane Lynch, Justin Grant Wade, Maliabeth Johnson, Matthew Richards, Matt Price, Heather Graham
